executable.title: SUV Factor Calculator
executable.description: Computes the standardized uptake value conversion factors based on body weight, lean body mass, body surface area, and ideal body weight. Takes an input path to a directory containing a PET volume (DICOM header must contain Radiopharmaceutical parameters).
executable.contributor: Ethan Ulrich (University of Iowa), Markus Van Tol (University of Iowa), Hans Johnson (University of Iowa), Wendy Plesniak (SPL, BWH), Nicole Aucoin (SPL, BWH), Ron Kikinis (SPL, BWH)
executable.acknowledgements: This work is funded by NIH National Cancer Institute grant U24 CA180918, the Harvard Catalyst, and the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

directory.name: PETDICOMPath
directory.label: PET DICOM volume path
directory.description: Input path to a directory containing a PET volume containing DICOM header information for SUV computation

string.name: weightUnits
string.label: Weight Units
string.description: Patient weight units (always assumed to be kg)

string.name: heightUnits
string.label: Height Units
string.description: Patient weight units (always assumed to be meters)

string.name: volumeUnits
string.label: Volume Units
string.description: Volume units for concentration (always assumed to be mL)

string.name: SUVbwConversionFactor
string.label: SUVbw Conversion Factor
string.description: Standardized Uptake Value (body weight) Conversion Factor

string.name: SUVlbmConversionFactor
string.label: SUVlbm Conversion Factor
string.description: Standardized Uptake Value (lean body mass) Conversion Factor

string.name: SUVbsaConversionFactor
string.label: SUVbsa Conversion Factor
string.description: Standardized Uptake Value (body surface area) Conversion Factor

string.name: SUVibwConversionFactor
string.label: SUVibw Conversion Factor
string.description: Standardized Uptake Value (ideal body weight) Conversion Factor
